overview: At Madame's 46th birthday party, one of the artists of the Noite das Estrelas, veterans and newcomers meet on a slab in the Maré favela. Between glamour, close-ups, performances and memories, they sew time and celebrate their bodies, which collectively live and resist through the arts. The short film is produced by Entidade Maré, a research project aimed at rescuing the narratives of LGBTI+ people from the favelas of Maré, in the North Zone of Rio de Janeiro.
title: Noite das estrelas
